mgci.jhdap.shogi

Class PlayerPane

  • java.lang.Object
    • mgci.jhdap.shogi.PlayerPane

  • public class PlayerPane
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the info box of one player in the statistics panel present in the shogi GUI.
    Author:
    Jiayin Huang, Dmitry Andreevich Paramonov

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      long dt
      Delta time; the total amount of time that this player has used up.
      protected long localStart
      The System.currentTimeMillis() value of the last time update.
      java.lang.String name
      The name of this player.
      static java.awt.Font notPlayingFont
      The font of the player pane if it is not their turn to play.
      boolean playing
      If true, then it is their turn to play.
      static java.awt.Font playingFont
      The font of the player pane if it is their turn to play.
      javax.swing.JTextArea txt
      The JTextArea object that contains all of the text for this player pane.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerPane(java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a new player pane of the given player name.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reset()
      Resets this player plane.
      void setNotPlaying()
      Sets it so that this player is not playing.
      void setPlaying()
      Sets it so that this player is playing.
      void updateTime()
      Updates the JTextArea with the total elapsed time.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • playingFont

        public static final java.awt.Font playingFont
        The font of the player pane if it is their turn to play.

      • notPlayingFont

        public static final java.awt.Font notPlayingFont
        The font of the player pane if it is not their turn to play.

      • playing

        public boolean playing
        If true, then it is their turn to play.

      • txt

        public javax.swing.JTextArea txt
        The JTextArea object that contains all of the text for this player pane.

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        The name of this player. TODO: There is currently no way to set player names.

      • dt

        public long dt
        Delta time; the total amount of time that this player has used up.

      • localStart

        protected long localStart
        The System.currentTimeMillis() value of the last time update.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerPane

        public PlayerPane(java.lang.String name)
        Constructs a new player pane of the given player name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player

    • Method Detail

      • setPlaying

        public void setPlaying()
        Sets it so that this player is playing. This resumes the timer, sets the pane outline to red, and sets the text to the playingFont.

      • setNotPlaying

        public void setNotPlaying()
        Sets it so that this player is not playing. This pauses the timer, sets the pane outline to black, and sets the text to the notPlayingFont.

      • updateTime

        public void updateTime()
        Updates the JTextArea with the total elapsed time.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets this player plane. This calls the setNotPlaying method, and sets dt to 0.
